metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20427 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: In the Lustre file system before 2.12.3, the ptlrpc module has a bufferoverflow and panic, and possibly remote code execution, due to the lack ofvalidation for specific fields of packets sent by a client. Interactionbetween req_capsule_get_size and tgt_brw_write leads to a tgt_shortio2pagesinteger signedness error.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
